description: 4th power of the lower triangular normalized partition matrix.
formula: Numerators of lower triangle of (a[ i, j ])^4 where a[ i, j ] = T(i, j)/Partitions(i) if j<=i, 0 if j>i
mathematica: rows = 7; m =  Table[If[k <= n, Length[IntegerPartitions[n, {k}]]/PartitionsP[n],    0], {n, 1, rows}, {k, 1, rows}]; m4 = m.m.m.m; Table[fracs = m4[[i]]; nums = fracs // Numerator; dens = fracs // Denominator; lcm = LCM @@ dens; Table[nums[[j]]*lcm/dens[[j]], {j, 1, i}], {i, 1, rows}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 05 2013 *)
author: _Olivier Gérard_
